text:
BREAKING (WSJ): "Scientists found traces of the [SARS-CoV-2] virus in wastewater samples collected in Brazil beginning in late November [2019]."

This further confirms the COVID-19 timeline in Proof of Corruption and evidence the Trump White House knew of the virus in fall 2019.
